verses.verse: This <WG5124> is the third time <WG5154> I am coming <WG2064> to <WG4314> you. <WG5209> In <WG1909> the mouth <WG4750> of two <WG1417> or <WG2532> three <WG5140> witnesses <WG3144> shall every <WG3956> word <WG4487> be established. <WG2476>

I told you before, <WG4280> and <WG2532> foretell <WG4302> you, as if <WG5613> I were present, <WG3918> the <WG3588> second time; <WG1208> and <WG2532> being absent <WG548> now <WG3568> I write <WG1125> to them which heretofore have sinned, <WG4258> and <WG2532> to all <WG3956> other, <WG3062> that, <WG3754> if <WG1437> I come <WG2064> again, <WG3825> I will not <WG3756> spare: <WG5339>

Since <WG1893> ye seek <WG2212> a proof <WG1382> of Christ <WG5547> speaking <WG2980> in <WG1722> me, <WG1698> which <WG3739> to <WG1519> you-ward <WG5209> is not weak, <WG770> <WG3756> but <WG235> is mighty <WG1414> in <WG1722> you. <WG5213>

For <WG1063> though <WG2532> <WG1487> he was crucified <WG4717> through <WG1537> weakness, <WG769> yet <WG235> he liveth <WG2198> by <WG1537> the power <WG1411> of God. <WG2316> For <WG1063> we <WG2249> also <WG2532> are weak <WG770> in <WG1722> him, <WG846> but <WG235> we shall live <WG2198> with <WG4862> him <WG846> by <WG1537> the power <WG1411> of God <WG2316> toward <WG1519> you. <WG5209>

Examine <WG3985> yourselves, <WG1438> whether <WG1487> ye be <WG2075> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> faith; <WG4102> prove <WG1381> your own selves. <WG1438> <WG2228> Know <WG1921> ye not <WG3756> your own selves, <WG1438> <WG2228> how that <WG3754> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> is <WG2076> in <WG1722> you, <WG5213> except <WG1509> ye be <WG2075> reprobates? <WG96>
But <WG1161> I trust <WG1679> that <WG3754> ye shall know <WG1097> that <WG3754> we <WG2249> are <WG2070> not <WG3756> reprobates. <WG96>

Now <WG1161> I pray <WG2172> to <WG4314> God <WG2316> that ye <WG5209> <WG3361> do <WG4160> no <WG3367> evil; <WG2556> not <WG3756> that <WG2443> we <WG2249> should appear <WG5316> approved, <WG1384> but <WG235> that <WG2443> ye <WG5210> should do <WG4160> that which is honest, <WG2570> though <WG1161> we <WG2249> be <WG5600> as <WG5613> reprobates. <WG96>
For <WG1063> we can do <WG1410> nothing <WG5100> <WG3756> against <WG2596> the <WG3588> truth, <WG225> but <WG235> for <WG5228> the <WG3588> truth. <WG225>

For <WG1063> we are glad, <WG5463> when <WG3752> we <WG2249> are weak, <WG770> and <WG1161> ye <WG5210> are <WG5600> strong: <WG1415> and <WG1161> this <WG5124> also <WG2532> we wish, <WG2172> even your <WG5216> perfection. <WG2676>

Therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> I write <WG1125> these things <WG5023> being absent, <WG548> lest <WG3363> being present <WG3918> I should use <WG5530> sharpness, <WG664> according <WG2596> to the <WG3588> power <WG1849> which <WG3739> the <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> hath given <WG1325> me <WG3427> to <WG1519> edification, <WG3619> and <WG2532> not <WG3756> to <WG1519> destruction. <WG2506>

Finally, <WG3063> brethren, <WG80> farewell. <WG5463> Be perfect, <WG2675> be of good comfort, <WG3870> be of one mind, <WG5426> <WG846> live in peace; <WG1514> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> God <WG2316> of love <WG26> and <WG2532> peace <WG1515> shall be <WG2071> with <WG3326> you. <WG5216>
Greet <WG782> one another <WG240> with <WG1722> a holy <WG40> kiss. <WG5370>

The <WG3588> grace <WG5485> of the <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> love <WG26> of God, <WG2316> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> communion <WG2842> of the <WG3588> Holy <WG40> Ghost, <WG4151> be with <WG3326> you <WG5216> all. <WG3956> Amen. <WG281>
